Google wants to know your views on important issues related to Digital Marketing. Here’s your 

 chance to do cool things that matter and be a part of the event organised under the Google 

 Student Ambassador Program. If you have the ability to come up with quirky innovative 

 solutions, then get ready to present your ideas and get noticed. 
 
 
 Overview : 

 Participating teams are required to come up with innovative ideas and creative solutions to the 

 given topics in the form of a presentation. The participants are free to choose among either of 

 the two topics 

 • Social Media: A Powerful Tool Of Digital Marketing 

 • Real Time Marketing: Tactics To Engage Customers 

 Date: 14th and 15th April. 

 
 
 Rules and Regulations: 

 • Each team can have a maximum of 3 members. 

 • Members can be from different colleges. 

 • Teams can bring the raw materials and rough draft of their presentation and abstract. 

 • During the event participants may interact with the judges, visitors and mentors to clear 

 any doubts they have on the topic. 

 • Each team will be given maximum 15 minutes to present their ideas to the judges and 

 visitors. 

 • The teams that sell their idea to most number of people i.e. get the maximum number 

 of votes, will be declared winners. 

 • Participants are also required to send their Name, Contact no. , Email id and the name 

 of the Institution they are currently attending while sending the abstracts. 

 
 
 Judging Parameters: 

 • Clarity of idea. 

 • Layout of the text abstract. 

 ? Innovation and research. 

 ? Presentation quality. 

 ? Nature of delivery. 

 ? Response to the questions asked by the judges. 

 ? Quality, originality and versatility of solutions suggested. 

 Register at - http://goo.gl/forms/v3Aor8CmoE
